title: Make LoginPage fully bilingual (French/English)

requirements.text: Update LoginPage component to use bilingual translations for all text content including mission statement, feature descriptions, and button labels

quotes: Make the homepage/landing page fully bilingual (fr, en)

acceptanceCriteria: All text content on LoginPage displays in the user's selected language (English or French)
Mission statement, feature cards, and login button text are translated
Language switch updates all text on the page immediately without page reload

requirements.text: Add French translations for all LoginPage text strings to the translations system, ensuring complete parity with English content
acceptanceCriteria: French translations exist for hero title, mission statement, all feature cards (titles and descriptions), and call-to-action button
Translation keys follow existing naming conventions in the translations system
No untranslated text remains on the LoginPage when French locale is selected

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend/src/components/ui
Use existing LanguageContext and translations system from frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.tsx and frontend/src/lib/translations.ts
nonGoals: Adding new languages beyond French and English
Changing the visual design or layout of the LoginPage
Modifying authentication flow or Internet Identity integration
